amendment.description: Strike section 538 (page 179, beginning line 6), relating to a sense of the House of Representatives regarding Secretary of Defense review of section 504 of title 10, United States Code, regarding enlisting certain aliens in the Armed Forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 202 (Roll no. 229).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Brooks (AL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 202 (Roll no. 229).
